description: Provides the globally unique identifier for an [Object](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-object) or [Link](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-link). Refer to the [JSON-LD](https://json-ld.org/spec/latest/json-ld/) specification for a complete description of the `@id` field.
title: JSON-LD `@id`
